Articles.Content:
**Concept:** A-6E 'Intruder'

> ![800px-A-6E_Intruder_VA-52.JPEG](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/df/A-6E_Intruder_VA-52.JPEG/800px-A-6E_Intruder_VA-52.JPEG)

**Manufacturer:** Sentinel Heavy Industries

**Role:** Mid-wing Attack Aircraft

**Current Version:** 'Charlie' Version

**Power-plant:** Twin C7-BTFE-001 Turbofans rated at 200TU

**Max Cruise:** 560m/s

**Max Rated:** 600m/s

**Max Altitude:** 8-9km

**Flight Time and Range:** Est 20 min\'s or 560km

**Aircraft Image:** 

> ![f103.jpg](http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/3316/f103.jpg)

Oooh, very nice replica. I was never really all that impressed with the aviation parts, I always thought you couldn\'t really make anything out of them that would even vaguely resemble a real aircraft. Nice to see I was wrong. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Says the guy who made a fairly believable F/A 18 clone ...
